DOC.brief_summary: Determine whether mid-day suppression hunger amplify increase release glucose-dependent insulinotropic peptide ( GIP ) glucagon-like peptide 1 ( GLP-1 ) follow morning exercise due increase fat content diet per se combination high fat diet morning exercise . The action gut peptide , particularly GLP-1 , gastric empty likely important mediating effect postprandial appetite glycemia ( Nauck et al . 1997 ) . Our hypothesis exercise amplifies gut peptide secretion diet enrich fat , stimulus suppresses hunger sensation .
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Effects Insulin , Gut Peptides , Appetite
DOC.detailed_description: Specific aim : Determine whether change macronutrient composition 60 % carbohydrate 25 % fat 30 % carbohydrate 45 % fat responsible suppression hunger increase secretory response glucose-dependent insulinotropic hormone ( GIP ) glucagon-like peptide-1 ( GLP-1 ) , whether change depend precede exercise . We measure ( ) concentration plasma GIP GLP-1 chemiluminescent multiplex assay , ( b ) concentration plasma ancetaminophen ass gastric empty rate , ( c ) concentration plasma insulin , glucagon radioimmunoassay , glucose , ketone body , free fatty acid appropriate spectrophotometric method , ( ) hourly appetite response visual analog scale two condition : sedentary ( SED ) exercise ( EX ) . Hypothesis : Hunger suppression secretion GIP GLP-1 morning meal great slow gastric empty rate meal consist 45 % fat 30 % carbohydrate follow three hour 2-hour bout moderate-intensity exercise absence exercise .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal status Age 50 65 year BMI 20 30 kg/m2 . Good health status ( normotensive , fast glucose < 100 mg/dl , , hematocrit > 32 % , hemoglobin > 12 mg/dl ) Absence restrict food intake Absence endocrine metabolic disorder require medication hormonally correct hypothyroidism Absence musculoskeletal disability would prevent walk Presence endocrine metabolic disease require medication , hormonally correct hypothyroidism Presence musculoskeletal disability would prevent walk Smoking Active diet Absence list inclusion criterion Unwillingness follow study protocol .
